name: Knowledge Is Power (itch) (Nature Studioz)
description:
One day.  A UFO wants to take earth's wisdom and knowledge. However, other aliens and ships want earth's knowledge as well.

Avoid the Aliens and Ships and collect all of the wisdom dummies to get more wisdom.

Instructions: Touch this to increase your wisdom counter. And also increase the weight of the ship. Yikes!!: Don't touch these guys:
You Control this guy.

Use the arrow keys or the wasd keys  to move the UFO guy.

Press the space bar when your wisdom counter has at least 4 points to flash a light that kills all enemies on screen.

Press the E key or P key to pause.

Make sure to have fun.
